data.oai_dc:dc: We have seed mass, fruit mass, wood density, maximum adult height, and a wide range of leaf traits for 400 to 800 species of shrubs, trees and woody lianas depending on the trait. The plants are all from lowland forests in central Panama. Most are from old-growth forests on Barro Colorado Island. Many are from young secondary forests (2-20 years old) on the nearby mainla

Canopy diameter along the longest axis|Canopy height observed|Dispersal syndrome|Leaf dry matter content|Flowering plant height highest leaf elongated|Leaf carbon concentration per mass|Leaf carbon content per area|Leaf compoundness|Leaf delta13carbon (13C)|Leaf tensile strength|Leaf mass per area|Leaf nitrogen concentration per mass|Leaf nitrogen content per area|Leaf phosphorus concentration per mass|Leaf phosphorus content per area|Leaf puncturability|Leaf resistance to fracture|Leaflet area|Maximum plant height|Plant growth form|Specific leaf area|Potential decomposition rate of litter|Seed dry mass|Seed mass|Stem diameter at 1.3 m (DBH)|Wood density (stem specific density)|Wood specific gravity|TRAITNET REGISTRY
